metadata.synopsis: A Zhentarim agent guarding Roah Moonglow. She's looking around at the growing power of the church and feeling wary of it.
metadata.how_to_trigger: in main menu: loadlevel SCL_Main_Agoto -173; 23; -177speak with Yerle

0.speaker: Yerle
0.text: Ain't looking to convert, True Soul. Gods mind their mess, I mind mine.
0.context: NodeContext: Respectful but flat refusal - most Absolutists want to convert others, and she's pre-empting it.

1.speaker: Yerle
1.text: This was funny when it was just goblins branding arses. But you lot mean business, eh?
1.context: NodeContext: Wary. Your church was a funny joke to her once, no longer.
